item.title: Earring Display/Storage
item.description: I have an affinity for jewelry, I'll admit it.  I'm a girl, so I feel it's okay.  I have a couple of jewelry boxes already, but some things are difficult to store.  Like most women with a thing for jewelry, I have more earrings than I know what to do …
item.dc:creator: phyereneyce

item.title: Tape Painting
item.description: Somewhere in my online travels, I came across a nifty idea that seemed relatively simple to pull off.  It's called tape painting.  The idea is that you apply pieces of tape to a blank canvas, in any manner you want, then paint the canvas, again, in any manner you want …
item.dc:creator: phyereneyce
